subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kurt Busch won his third consecutive pole in the Nascar Sprint Cup series, finishing first in qualifying at Michigan International Speedway with a lap of 188.699 miles per hour.
snippet: Kurt Busch won his third consecutive pole in the Nascar Sprint Cup series, finishing first in qualifying at Michigan International Speedway with a lap of 188.699 miles per hour.
